pr_title: [FLINK-19906][table-planner] Fix incorrect result when compare two binary fields

timeline.bodyText:
/** * Compares two byte arrays in lexicographical order. * *

The result is * positive if {@code array1} is great than {@code array2}, * negative if {@code array1} is less than {@code array2} and * 0 if {@code array1} is equal to {@code array2}. * *

Note: Currently, this is used in {@code ScalarOperatorGens} * for comparing two fields of binary or varbinary type. * * @param array1 byte array to compare. * @param array2 byte array to compare. * @return an Integer indicating which one is bigger */
timeline.author: danny0405

timeline.message:
[FLINK-19906][table-planner-blink] Fix incorrect result when compare two binary fields

This closes #13865

[FLINK-19906][table-planner-blink] Fix incorrect result when compare two binary fields

This closes #13865
